section.name: Stimulus
section.definition: General description of an applied stimulus. This section is basis of various related sections that specify more specific stimuli.

property.name: Description
property.definition: A textual description of the stimulus.

property.name: Comment
property.definition: A comment on this specific stimulus.

property.name: Author
property.definition: Who is the author of this stimulus.

property.name: Intensity
property.definition: like the current in case of electrical stimulation.

property.name: Location
property.definition: Describes the site of the stimulus application.

property.name: Modality
property.definition: Visual, acoustic, haptic, electrical, etc. stimulation.

property.name: Repetitions
property.definition: The number of repetitions of the described stimulation.

property.name: InterstimulusInterval
property.definition: The time between two subsequent stimulations.

property.name: StimulusFile
property.definition: The stimulus file used. Using it will blow up the the size of the metadatafile and we recommend to rather define the URL of underlying stimulus file.

property.name: StimulusFileURL
property.definition: The URL of a an applied stimulus file. This is the recommended alternative to explicitely including the actual stimulus via StimulusFile.

property.name: Position
property.definition: The position of the stimulus on e.g the screen. Specified as a 2-tuple (x;y). By default this position refers to the top-left corner of the object or its bounding box.

property.name: PositionReference
property.definition: By default stimulus positions are specified by the coordinates of the top-left corner (or of the bounding box). Use this property for other definitions.

property.name: SpatialExtent
property.definition: The spatial extend of the presented stimulus (width;height) e.g. (1024;768).
